attributes.action: Create a unifed UK football team for the world cup only
attributes.additional_details: We the people of the United Kingdom want to be represented on the world football stage as the United Kingdom or Britian football team. We want players from Wales, Scotland, Northern Ireland and England playing on the same team during the World Cup but individually represented during the European Championship. This would also alow the country to unite behind one team and create greater national identity

rejection.details: For the respective Football Associations to decide upon.
